Name: Closable Tabs
Description: This project demonstrates how you can implement close and create buttons in the tab headers using MVVM. The creating of tabs is limited to 5 and the closing of tabs is limited to 1 tab.
KeyWords: Closable Tabs,  close, button, mvvm, create, databinding

Name: Editable Tab Headers
Description: This SDK example demonstrates how you can create a tab control with editable tab headers.

Name: Custom Tab Control Region Adapter
Description: This SDK example demonstrates how you can create a CustomRegionAdaptor for the RadTabControl.
KeyWords: Custom Tab Control Region Adapter,  prism, navigation
